overview: In Eat British Potatoes Again, Sophie Lindsey explores nationhood through the nation’s favourite snack, Walkers Ready Salted crisps. Lindsey spotlights the soundscape of a British supermarket, the nostalgic boast of ‘100% Great British Potatoes’, and the links between identity, Britishness and consumerism – with a delightfully wry final ritual.
title: Eat British Potatoes Again
